params.name: booking
params.doc: Booking to calculate the price for.

docs.summary: Calculates the price of a booking.
description:
In case there is no implementer of the
[Bookings Pricing Provider SPI](UPDATE-LINK)
for the site, the price is calculated using the standard
Wix Bookings pricing logic. Then, you need to pass a `serviceId` in the
`slot` or `schedule` object inside `bookings.bookedEntity`. Otherwise, the
call results in a `MISSING_SERVICE_ID` error.

The response includes information about each line item's price and the total price.

docs.summary: Previews the price for a set of line items belonging to the same service.
description:
You can only call __Preview Price__ succesfully, in case no implementer of
the [Bookings Pricing Provider SPI](UPDATE-LINK)
has been set up for the site.

Passing line items belonging to different services results in an error.

You must pass a `serviceId` in the `slot` or `schedule` object inside
`bookings.bookedEntity`. Otherwise, the call results in a
`MISSING_SERVICE_ID` error.

The response includes information about each line item's price and the total price.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.doc: Coordinates of the physical address.

members.name: hint
members.doc: Free text to help find the address.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Zip/postal code.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: subdivisions
members.doc: Multi-level subdivisions from top to bottom.

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Address latitude.

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Address longitude.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street name, number and apartment number.

members.name: schedule
members.doc: The booked schedule. The booking is automatically be assigned to the schedule's sessions.

members.name: slot
members.doc: The booked slot, which once booked becomes a session. The booking is automatically assigned to the session if given, or a session is be created if one does'nt already exist.

members.name: tags
members.doc:
List of tags for the booking.
System-assigned tags for sessions and schedules are:
+ "INDIVIDUAL" Appointments, including appointments with more than 1 participant.
+ "GROUP" Individual classes.
+ "COURSE" Courses.

members.name: title
members.doc: Session title at the time of booking.

members.name: schedule
members.doc: The booked schedule. The booking is automatically be assigned to the schedule's sessions.

members.name: slot
members.doc: The booked slot, which once booked becomes a session. The booking is automatically assigned to the session if given, or a session is be created if one does'nt already exist.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Booked resource ID.

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource's email at the time of booking.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource's name at the time of booking.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Resources schedule ID. Read only.

members.name: firstSessionStart
members.doc: Start time of the first session. (formatted according to RFC3339). Read only.

members.name: lastSessionEnd
members.doc: End time of the last session. (formatted according to RFC3339). Read only.

members.name: location
members.doc: Location where the schedule's sessions take place. Read only.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: ID of the booked service.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

members.name: endDate
members.doc: The end time of this Slot (formatted according to RFC3339).

members.name: location
members.doc: Location of the slot takes place.

members.name: resource
members.doc: The resource for the slot.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID. Required.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc:
ID of the underlying session when session is a single session or generated from a recurring session.
If sessionId is defined in the Create Booking request, the f startDate, endDate, timezone, resource, and location fields from the request are ignored and populated from the session's information.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: The start time of this slot (formatted according to RFC3339).

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone according to which the slot was shown to the user when booking, and should be shown in future.

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was created.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Booking ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the booking was updated.

members.name: additionalFields
members.doc: Additional custom fields submitted with the booking form.

members.name: bookedEntity
members.doc: An object describing the slot or schedule that was booked.

members.name: bookingSource
members.doc: An object describing the platform and application that made the booking. Read-Only.

members.name: contactDetails
members.doc: Contact details of the site visitor or member making the booking.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc:
id of the identity used to create the booking
If both Person identity and App identity are present, person identity takes precedence
only `id` is supported. contact_id and identity_type are not supported

members.name: doubleBooked
members.doc: Indicating if this booking overlaps an other existing confirmed booking

members.name: endDate
members.doc: The end date of this booking. For a slot, this is the end date of the slot. For a schedule, the end date of the last session.

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc: data extensions ExtendedFields

members.name: externalUserId
members.doc: External ID provided by the client app on creation. Read-Only.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Number of participants

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc:
Payment status.
One of:
- `"NOT_PAID"` The booking is not paid for.
- `"PAID"` The booking is fully paid.
- `"PARTIALLY_PAID"` The booking is partially paid.
- `"REFUNDED"` The booking is refunded.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number to be used when updating, rescheduling, or cancelling the booking. The revision number is automatically incremented when the booing is updated.

members.name: selectedPaymentOption
members.doc:
Selected payment option.
One of the payment options offered by the service, or another option if `skipSelectedPaymentOptionValidation` is `true`.
When undefined, the payment option is resolved by the service configuration on checkout. See [Create Booking](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/bookings-gateway/create-booking)

members.name: startDate
members.doc: The start date of this booking. For a slot, this is the start date of the slot. For a schedule, the start date of the first session.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Booking status.
One of:
- `"CREATED"` - The booking was created.
- `"UPDATED"` - The booking was updated.
- `"CONFIRMED"` - The booking has been confirmed and appears on the bookings calendar.
Booking can be manually confirmed using the Set As Confirmed endpoint.
Booking can be automatically confirmed when the following requirements are met:
+ The service is configured as automatically confirmed.
+ Invoking eCommerce checkout API and an order has been created.
- `"CANCELED"` - The booking has been canceled and synced to bookings calendar.
The booking can be canceled using cancel API.
- `"PENDING"` - The booking waiting to be confirmed or declined buy the owner and is synced to bookings calendar.
Bookings can be manually set as pending using setAsPending API, requires manage booking status permissions.
Booking can be automatically set as pending when the following requirements are met:
+ The Service is configured as manually confirmed.
+ Invoking the eCommerce checkout API and an order has been created.
- `"WAITING_LIST"` - The booking is pending on a waiting list.
Booking can be created with this status when invoking waiting list join API.
- `"DECLINED"` - The booking was declined by the owner and synced to bookings calendar.
Booking can be manually declined using decline API and requires manage booking permissions.
Booking can be automatically declined when the following requirements are met:
+ Invoking eCommerce checkout API and the order declined event has been sent.
+ Invoking eCommerce checkout API and order approved event has been sent, but the booking is offline and the booking causes a double booking.

members.name: choices
members.doc: Custom service choices.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Number of participants for the line item.

members.name: pricePerParticipant
members.doc: Price per participant for the line item.

members.name: resourceId
members.doc: Resource ID. Required for services of type appointment or class.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc:
Service ID. Required when no implementer for the
[Bookings Pricing Provider SPI](UPDATE-LINK)
has been set up for the site.

members.name: actor
members.doc:
Actor that created this booking.
<!--ONLY:VELO
One of:
- `"BUSINESS"`
- `"CUSTOMER"`
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: Wix site ID of the application that created the booking.

members.name: appName
members.doc: Name of the application that created the booking, as saved in Wix Developers Center at the time of booking.

members.name: platform
members.doc:
Platform from which a booking was created
<!--ONLY:VELO
One of:
- `"WEB"` Desktop browser.
- `"MOBILE_APP"` Mobile application.
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: booking
members.doc: Booking to calculate the price for.

members.name: priceInfo
members.doc: Information about each line item's price and the total price.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact's ID.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Contact's country in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: email
members.doc: Contact's email, used to create a new contact or get existing one from the [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts). Used to validate coupon usage limitations per contact. If not passed, the coupon usage limitation will not be enforced. (Coupon usage limitation validation is not supported yet).

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Contact's first name. When populated from a standard booking form, this property corresponds to the **Name** field.

members.name: fullAddress
members.doc: Contact's full address.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Contact's last name.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Contact's phone number.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Contact's time zone.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the form field as defined in the form.

members.name: label
members.doc: Form field's label at the time of submission.

members.name: value
members.doc: Value that was submitted for this field.

members.name: valueType
members.doc:
<!--ONLY:VELO
One of:
- `"SHORT_TEXT"`
- `"LONG_TEXT"`
- `"CHECK_BOX"`
<!--END:ONLY:VELO-->

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Data Extensions extended fields
Key: Namespace
Value: extended fields data in Struct format

members.name: skipAvailabilityValidation
members.doc:
When true, skips availability checking and allows booking.
Requires BOOKINGS.OVERRIDE_AVAILABILITY permissions.

members.name: skipBusinessConfirmation
members.doc:
When true, allows booking a confirmation-required service without requiring confirmation.
Requires BOOKINGS.IGNORE_BOOKING_POLICY permissions.

members.name: skipSelectedPaymentOptionValidation
members.doc:
When true, skips selected payment option checking as defined in `selectedPaymentOption` field
and allows booking.
Requires BOOKINGS.MANAGE_PAYMENTS permissions.

members.name: withRefund
members.doc: When true, refunds the booking's payment when the booking is canceled.

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of of a contact in the site's [CRM by Ascend](https://www.wix.com/ascend/crm) system.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: anonymousVisitorId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has not logged in to the site.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of an app.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID of a site visitor that has logged in to the site.

members.name: wixUserId
members.doc: ID of a Wix user (site owner, contributor, etc.).

members.name: _id
members.doc:
Business location ID. Available only for locations that are business locations,
meaning the `location_type` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: The full address of this location.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.

- `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`: The business address, as set in the siteâ€™s general settings.
- `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`: The address as set when creating the service.
- `"CUSTOM"`: The address as set for the individual session.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location name.

members.name: serviceChoices
members.doc: Information about the booked service choices. Includes the number of participants.

members.name: message
members.doc: Custom message to send to the participants about the changes to the booking.

members.name: notifyParticipants
members.doc:
Whether to send the message about the changes to the customer.

Default: `false`

members.name: bookingLineItems
members.doc: List of line items to preview the price for.

members.name: bookingLineItems
members.doc: List of line items to preview the price for.

members.name: priceInfo
members.doc: Information about each line item's price and the total price.

members.name: bookingLineItems
members.doc: List of line items including number of participants and price per participant.

members.name: calculatedPrice
members.doc:
Calculated total price. Available only when the
[service](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/services/service/create-service)'s
price has been set up as numerical value in the
`schedule.rate.labeledPriceOptions` object.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
3-letter currency code in
[ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: deposit
members.doc: Total deposit. Available only when the service includes a deposit.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc:
Description of the total price. Available only when the
[service](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/services/service/create-service)'s
price has been set up as text value in the
`schedule.rate.priceText` field.

members.name: calculatedPrice
members.doc:
Calculated total price. Available only when the
[service](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/services/service/create-service)'s
price has been set up as numerical value in the
`schedule.rate.labeledPriceOptions` object.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc:
Description of the total price. Available only when the
[service](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/services/service/create-service)'s
price has been set up as text value in the
`schedule.rate.priceText` field.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Value of one of the elements of the `CustomServiceOption.choices` list

members.name: optionId
members.doc: option (.wix.api.decomposite_of) = "wix.bookings.catalog.v1.ServiceChoice";

members.name: custom
members.doc: Value of one of the elements of the `CustomServiceOption.choices` list

members.name: choices
members.doc: Service choices for these participants.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Number of participants for this variant.

members.name: apt
members.doc: Apartment number.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: code
members.doc: Subdivision code. Usually state, region, prefecture or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).
